textBox.richText: There are only 5 more days left to go for the Game ON 2.0 exhibition!  In my last blog post, I hosted the cool Game ON 2.0 trivia that I created for the triOS College exhibit outside the Game ON 2.0 entrance at the Ontario Science Centre (shown above).  In this post, you’ll see the slides that give people interesting facts and information about the game industry and game development (shown below).  If you’d also like to check out the interactive information for the touchscreen in the middle of our exhibit, simply visit the following site: http://jasoneckert.net/OSC/  Enjoy!
